thread.title: Chase Elliott would love to drive a tank — if he can shoot something
thread.title_full: Chase Elliott would love to drive a tank — if he can shoot something

author: Brian
title: Chase Elliott would love to drive a tank — if he can shoot something
text:
Feb 22, 2017 at 2:49p ET 0Shares 
It hasn’t gotten to the extreme that the NFL’s Super Bowl media day — or whatever it’s called now — has been known to do over the years, but the Monster Energy NASCAR Cup Series drivers hear some pretty off-the-wall stuff at time during Daytona 500 media day, too. 
For example, one media member noted that Cup driver Joey Logano and his wife, Brittany, apparently were out driving a tank recently. He then asked Chase Elliott if he had any plans to drive a tank anytime soon. 
“Drive a tank? … I don’t have any plans to drive a tank,” said Elliott, driver of the No. 24 Hendrick Motorsports Chevrolet that will sit on the pole for this Sunday’s Daytona 500 (live on FOX at 2 p.m. ET). “It might be kind of cool to look inside one, but I can’t say driving a tank would do a whole lot for me. 
“I mean, maybe, I don’t know. We can’t shoot at anything, so no point in driving it.” 
To which Kyle Larson, another Cup driver who was sitting on stage with Elliott at the time, interjected: “They said they were shooting stuff yesterday.” 
Suddenly, Elliott seemed far more interested. 
“Oh, really? Well, then yeah, let’s go. If we get to shoot something, then yes,” he said, suddenly enthusiastic about the whole deal.
